author: Simple History
description:
Sponsored by World of Warships! Register now and get 20 days of Premium Account, the Japanese Tier III cruiser Tenryū, a Port Slot and Commander when you use code XVOYAGE and click here → https://wo.ws/46kvVDO

Life aboard a German U-boat in World War II was brutal, claustrophobic, and deadly. Follow Hans Fischer, a young mechanic turned U-boat crewman, as he endures stifling heat, toxic diesel fumes, no privacy, and the constant threat of enemy destroyers. Discover what it was really like inside a Type VIIC submarine during the Battle of the Atlantic — and why so few men survived the U-boat war.

Check out our other Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPdc6bs3I8s6Y4QE_3g3MZw
